p: Regarding the flavonoid and flavonols content of basil extracts, the highest quantity of flavonoids and flavonols were detected also in OBHE—48.22 mg RE/g dm and 9.43 mg RE/g dm, whereas in case of OBAE hydro-alcoholic extract, the quantities obtained were much lower. In the case of condensed tannins determination, the highest quantity was obtained the same for basil leaves extract, OBHE—11.18%, as against hydro-alcoholic extract from basil aerial part OBAE—8.27%.
